text: Arkadelphia is an Amtrak train station located at 798 South Fifth Street in Arkadelphia, Arkansas, in the restored Missouri Pacific Railroad station. Arkadelphia is a stop for the Texas Eagle.http://www.greatamericanstations.com/Stations/ARK/Station_view The station also serves as the headquarters for the regional transit agency. ==See also== *List of Amtrak stations ==References== == External links == *Amtrak Texas Eagle Stations - Arkadelphia, AR *Arkadelphia Amtrak Station (USA Rail Guide -- Train Web) *Arkadelphia (ARK)--Great American Stations (Amtrak) *Clark County Listings at the National Register of Historic Places Category:Amtrak stations in Arkansas Category:Former Missouri Pacific Railroad stations Category:Railway stations on the National Register of Historic Places in Arkansas Category:Railway stations in the United States opened in 1917 Category:Buildings and structures in Arkadelphia, Arkansas Category:Transportation in Clark County, Arkansas Category:National Register of Historic Places in Clark County, Arkansas
title: Arkadelphia station
